summary.span: 特性表是元数据特性的只读集合，其中的特性与特定的类型、成员和依赖项关联。

span.span: The attribute table is a read-only collection of metadata attributes that are associated with specific types, members, and dependencies.

summary.span: 返回在属性、成员或类型本身上具有特性重写的所有类型的枚举。

span.span: Returns an enumeration of all types that have attribute overrides, on a property, member, or the type itself.
Returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于确定在将此特性表添加到元数据存储区中时将刷新哪些类型。This can be used to determine what types will be refreshed when this attribute table is added to the metadata store.
